column2: Through glorious conquest and magnificent diplomacy, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has finally united all East Africans

Although East Africans have only rarely been united, they have significant cultural similarities. However, if a particularly dynamic leader was able to unite them and persuade them to set aside their differences, the resulting nation would become a force to be reckoned with...
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is of §YEthiopian, Nubian or Somali culture§!
No-one has ever created the §YEast African Unity bloodline§!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns at least one province of §YEthiopian culture§!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns at least one province of §YNubian culture§!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns at least one province of §YSomali culture§!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns at least 20 provinces of §YEthiopian, Nubian or Somali culture§! in the §YEast Africa§! region
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns every province of §YEthiopian, Nubian or Somali culture§! in the §YEast Africa§! region

[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns every province of §YEthiopian, Nubian or Somali culture§! in the §YEast Africa§! region\n§YINFO:§! A list of missing provinces is provided in the tooltip for the "take decision" button.

\n§YINFO:§! The following provinces are required to form the bloodline (they have §YEthiopian, Nubian or Somali culture§! and are located in §YEast Africa§!), but they are NOT owned by [This.GetTitledFirstName]:

column1: # Special building names - Castle (as per vanilla, these are the same as for tribal)

column2: Has an §Yactive East African Unity bloodline§!
Any §Ysame culture group§! liege has a §Ysimilar or more-advanced government form§!, and has an §Yactive East African Unity bloodline§!
Build §YEthiopian, Nubian & Somali§! buildings in all §YEast African culture§! provinces
